name: Horizon Leonard: Galactic Scavenger
description:
Join our planet hopping hero Leonard on his incredible space voyage! Explore new worlds and scavenge across all eight unique planets!

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 38 Game Jam in Spring 2017.

** Controller Recommended! (xbox360 or similar) **

Credits:
Matt Woelk (programming)
Ben Bergman (graphics and level design)
Dustin Bogers (modelling and graphics)
Justin Koop (sound and music)
Dan Bergman (sound and music)

Ludum Dare submission page: ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/horizon-leonard-galactic-scavenger
